t:
When the drought hit us for the third year, the village priest sermoned that we need to sacrifice a VIRGIN girl to please the ‘water God’,
else the scarcity of water will kill everyone in the village.

On the day of the sacrifice, when they revealed the face of the girl, I knew that I'd doomed all life in the village.
c:
I'm doomed, either way.


You're free to conclude what might have happened with her.



#drought #sermon #virgin #sacrifice #indra #doomed #superstition #intercourse





***SPOILER***

Explanation: I know everyone's doomed cause I, and only I, know that she isn't a virgin...
